## Checklist

- [ ] I have tested my changes locally (`npm run dev`)
- [ ] The site builds successfully (`npm run build`)
- [ ] I have followed the existing style and formatting
- [ ] I have checked for typos and grammar
- [ ] All links work correctly
- [ ] I have updated `_meta.json` if adding new pages
- [ ] My changes are focused and don't include unrelated modifications
